backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles, subscription plans, proposal generation, and saved proposals with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that loads the React application and main script.
frontend/QA-MANUAL.md: Manual QA checklist covering authentication, generate flow, dashboard, proposal detail, account page, and error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, theme provider, authenticated layouts, and app routes.
frontend/src/components/account/PlanCard: Displays subscription plan details, usage stats, and handles Premium upgrade actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Redirects unauthenticated users, shows a loader while initializing, and renders children only when identity is present.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal prompting new authenticated users to create a profile and submits profile data to the backend.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserMenu.ts: Shows a user dropdown with identity info and provides a logout action that clears session and caches.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/SavedP: Fetches and lists saved proposals with view and delete actions, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/generate/Editabl: Provides an editable text section with edit, save, and copy functionality for proposal content.
frontend/src/components/generate/Generat: Displays editable generated proposal outputs and reports changes back to the parent component.
Collects input for proposal generation, checks entitlement limits, and triggers proposal creation and mutation.
frontend/src/components/generate/QuotaBa: Shows remaining generation quota or premium status with upgrade prompts when applicable.
frontend/src/components/generate/SavePro: Saves the current proposal input and output via mutation and shows loading and success/error states.
Layout wrapper providing header navigation, footer, and main content area with active route highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and persistent identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, entitlements, proposal generation, upgrades, and saved proposal retrieval.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for themes and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry mounting React with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Account management page showing subscription details and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying saved proposals with a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratePage.tsx: Proposal generation page managing input, generated output, editing, and saving proposals.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page prompting login and showcasing features, redirecting authenticated users to generation.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalDetailPage.ts: Displays a proposal’s details, supports copying fields, and allows deletion with confirmation and navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Provides a clipboard copy helper using the Clipboard API with a textarea fallback.
frontend/src/utils/number.ts: Converts bigint values safely to numbers and transforms nanosecond timestamps into JavaScript Dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash segments, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the project’s state, features, issues, and architectural notes for ProposalPro AI.
